name: The Vessel of Embers
description:
"Centuries ago, we lived in peace and harmony under the warmth of the sun, secure and united. 

But then, an ice spirit stole all of the sun’s energy for herself and brought havoc and despair to my people. 
She destroyed our world and extinguished every flame. Except, for one.

You are the vessel that shall carry my flame and together, we will get  our stolen energy back and restore our history"

Your journey begins as you are spawned by a being of light and heat. You are given one mission that will decide the future of your species.

Are you going to uncover the truth that is hidden beneath the ice?

The Vessel of Embers is a game that focuses on fun, fluid gameplay alongside a mysterious story
You can double jump, dash, attack and glide your way through the various different obstacles the game will throw at you.

This game was developed by Leonardo Delafiori
